text: Robert Abela (born 22 June 1977) is a Maltese lawyer and politician. He was appointed the 14th Prime Minister of Malta on January 13, 2020. Abela is the son of former President of Malta George Abela. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Malta Category:Maltese lawyers Category:Current national leaders Category:MEPs for Malta
title: Robert Abela
